mapper.select: select * from (select department_name, to_char(hire_date, 'yyyy') unit from employees e inner join (select rank, department_id, '(TOP'|| rank || ')'||department_name department_name from (select department_id, dense_rank() over( order by count(*) desc ) rank from employees group by department_id) e left outer join departments d using(department_id) where rank <= 3 ) r using(department_id) ) pivot ( count(unit) for unit in( '2001' as y2001, '2002' as y2002, '2003' as y2003, '2004' as y2004, '2005' as y2005, '2006' as y2006, '2007' as y2007, '2008' as y2008, '2023' as y2023 )) order by department_name

select * from (select department_name, to_char(hire_date,'mm') unit from employees e inner join (select rank, department_id, '(TOP'|| rank || ')'||department_name department_name from (select department_id, dense_rank() over( order by count(*) desc ) rank from employees group by department_id) e left outer join departments d using(department_id) where rank <= 3) r using(department_id) ) pivot ( count(unit) for unit in ( '01' as m01, '02' as m02, '03' as m03, '04' as m04, '05' as m05 , '06' as m06, '07' as m07, '08' as m08, '09' as m09, '10' as m10, '11' as m11, '12' as m12 ) ) order by department_name
select to_char( hire_date, 'yyyy')||'년' unit, count(*) count from employees group by to_char(hire_date, 'yyyy') order by unit
select to_char( hire_date, 'MM')||'월' unit, count(*) count from employees group by to_char(hire_date, 'MM') order by unit

select department_id, nvl( department_name, '소속없음') department_name, count(employee_id) count from employees e left outer join departments d using(department_id) group by department_id, department_name order by department_id
